Ajay - Riteish Troll Each Other, 1500 Drunk Strangers Sing 'I Want It That Way' & More From Ent
Ajay - Riteish Troll Each Other, 1500 Drunk Strangers Sing 'I Want It That Way' & More From Ent
If you need some lessons on how to be savage while trolling your friends, Ajay Devgn and Riteish Deshmukh are here to help you out. The duo share such a tight bond that they are on a trolling spree.
Learning it in 3 parts, the song turned out to be a smashing hit. The video, since then has gone viral, so much so, that one of the members of BSB, Kevin Richardson tweeted about the outcome
Now a case has been registered in Jodhpur against Hardik Pandya and KL Rahul and also Bollywood filmmaker Karan Johar in the same regard. The case has been filed by D R Meghwal at a police station in Luni in Jodhpur under various sections of the Indian Penal Code.
4. Relive The Good Old Times! Amitabh Bachchan Shares A 90's Throwback Pic With Sridevi, Salman & Aamir
Rare pic - Amitabh Bachchan with SriDevi ji , Aamir Khan and Salman Khan During rehearsals for 'Jhumma Chumma' concert in London-Wembley Stadium~ 70,000 audience .. @SrBachchan pic.twitter.com/nxtnErLgKR — Moses Sapir (@MosesSapir) February 5, 2019
Bringing in a wave of nostalgia, Amitabh Bachchan recently shared a rare picture of himself with late actress Sridevi, Aamir Khan and Salman Khan, and it’s pure gold.
Don't Miss 862 SHARES 346 SHARES
Well, not only fans, Julia Michaels was shocked at this too. So much so, that she decided to tweet to Anushka Sharma. Sharing the collage of side-by-side picture with her, she wrote, “Hi @AnushkaSharma apparently we’re twins lol.”
